name: Rapture Engine: Catendo Edition
description:
Revolutionary, using 2.5D technology making best of both worlds, 2d and 3d. Made in celebration of Catendo's first game, 2 months ago.

Make and play platforming levels and games! For more detailed instructions, click the question mark on the main menu.

Post your levels and games here: https://www.reddit.com/r/RaptureEngine/

Features:

• 75 tiles, including a wealth of hazards and power-ups

• 42 backgrounds

• 20 original songs

• 9 boss types

• Add additional objectives and rules to your level

• Save and load levels using codes

• Play from a built-in selection of 45+ levels

• Combine levels into full games

• So much more!
